subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Tucker Fredricks of the United States edged the World Cup leader Yu Fengtong of China to win the 500-meter race in Erfurt, Germany. Fredricks became the first speedskater to break 35 seconds at the oval, finishing in 34.91 to beat Yu’s course record by 0.12.
